price: Na Mitume watakapo wekewa wakati wao,
footnotes: Na Mitume wakawekewa wakati maalumu wahudhurie kwa ajili ya kuwatolea ushahidi kaumu zao.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

translations: are gathered to their appointed time
